title: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters. This behavior is unexpected and should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during working set manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should revert any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
OB: When removing a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters.
EB: The package view in the background should not immediately refilter when removing a working set. It should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog. Pressing cancel should revert any changes made to the working sets, including cancelling the remove operation.
SR: 1. Open the working set selection dialog.
